Package com.spring.web.controller

Class QuizController

java.lang.Object
com.spring.web.controller.QuizController
@Controller public class QuizController extends Object
the controller for the quiz for all the specific methods that relate to quizzes
Author:
Samantha Jermyn, caovinh lam, christian lee

  • Method Details

    • getQuizList

      @GetMapping("/quizList") public String getQuizList(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Will take user to view quizzes or index
      Parameters:
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      quizlist page for user to view quizzes OR index if error

    • getCreateQuizManual

      @GetMapping("/createQuizManual") public String getCreateQuizManual(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      returns page to manually create quiz OR index

    • postCreateQuizObject

      @PostMapping("/createQuizManualObject") public String postCreateQuizObject(@ModelAttribute TempQuiz quizObject, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Updates a quiz that corresponds to the tempQuiz objects id and saves the updates to database.
      Parameters:
      quizObject - - TempQuiz object that stores changes to quiz object
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page back to quiz list display OR index if error

    • postCreateQuizObjectindex

      @GetMapping("/createQuizManualObject") public String postCreateQuizObjectindex()
      this method is used to prevent an error if the user tries to access the post method and direct them home
      Returns:
      - this method returns the user back the index page

    • getCreateQuiz

      @GetMapping("/createQuiz") public String getCreateQuiz(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Create empty temporary quiz object
      Parameters:
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in and allows user object to be added to model
      model - - stores attributes that can be accessed on the front-end, in this case objects and a flag message
      Returns:
      String Object - takes user to createQuizForm

    • getCreateQuizAuto

      @PostMapping("/createQuizAuto") public String getCreateQuizAuto(@ModelAttribute TempQuiz tempQuiz, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Post auto generate quizzes based on inputs passed by user
      Parameters:
      tempQuiz - - stores the list of content type tags and format tags passed in by the user
      request - - passes inputs from the front-end to the back-end
      model - - stores model attributes that can be accessed in the front-end, in this case a list of question objects, user object and flag messages
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in and allows user object to be added to model
      Returns:
      String Object - takes user to quizList if successful creation

    • getCreateQuizAutoindex

      @GetMapping("/createQuizAuto") public String getCreateQuizAutoindex()
      this method is used to prevent an error if the user tries to access the post method and direct them home
      Returns:
      - this method returns the user back the index page

    • quizDetails

      @GetMapping("/quizDetails") public String quizDetails(@RequestParam int quizId, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Retrieve selected question from the database and display its information and answers
      Parameters:
      quizId - - int value for a quiz ID
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      takes user to quiz detials page OR index page if error with authentication

    • editQuiz

      @GetMapping("/editQuiz") public String editQuiz(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Takes user to a page to edit quiz
      Parameters:
      id - - int value of quiz
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page to edit quiz OR back to home page

    • editQuizObject

      @PostMapping("/editQuizObject") public String editQuizObject(@ModelAttribute TempQuiz quizObject, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Parameters:
      quizObject - - TempQuiz object that stores new quiz data to update
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page to view edited quiz details OR back to index

    • deleteQuiz

      @GetMapping("/deleteQuiz") public String deleteQuiz(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Deletes a quiz from the quizList page and returns the admin to the quizList page
      Parameters:
      id - - int value for quiz id
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page back to quizList page OR index page

    • viewUnreviewedQuizzes

      @GetMapping("/viewUnreviewedQuizzes") public String viewUnreviewedQuizzes(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      gets all the unreviewed quizzes and saves to model before opening the page
      Parameters:
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page to see all unreviewd quizzes

    • finishQuizReview

      @GetMapping("/finishQuizReview") public String finishQuizReview(@RequestParam Integer id, @RequestParam boolean value, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      this method will either set a quizes approved value to true or false and set the reviewed value to true before redirecting to viewUnreviewedQuizzes
      Parameters:
      id - - integer id value of a quiz
      value - - boolean value for approved
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page to view unreviewed question OR index page if error occurs

    • favouriteQuiz

      @GetMapping("/favouriteQuiz") public String favouriteQuiz(@RequestParam int quizid, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      will favourite/unfavaourite a quiz depending on if its already been favourited by the user
      Parameters:
      quizid - - int value of a quiz id
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page to view all approved quizzes

    • viewQuizesCreated

      @GetMapping("/viewQuizesCreated") public String viewQuizesCreated(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      Gets all quizzes created by user with ID id and displays it
      Parameters:
      id - - int value of a user id
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      page to view all quizzes created by userID

    • favouriteQuizFromStudent

      @GetMapping("/favouriteQuizFromStudent") public String favouriteQuizFromStudent(@RequestParam int quizid, org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
      lets user favourite a quiz from student and returns them back to view quizzes created by student
      Parameters:
      quizid - - int value of a quiz
      model - - used to pass the object to the front end html, in this case a user object for the register field
      session - - used to check if the user is logged in so they are redirected to the index page
      Returns:
      returns admin back to page to view all quizzes created by a student
